Welcome to Gaussian-2-Blender’s documentation!¶

Gaussian-2-Blender is an API to convert .com input files from Gaussian and .xyz files from various sources into 3D models ready to be used in Blender, Maya, Unity, Unreal, and other programs for 3D modeling.

  • Check out the Getting Started section for further information on how to use the program.

  • Check out the For Developers section if you plan to extend the functionality of the program.

  • Check out the GUI section to see all the scripts and modules to build the program’s graphical user interface.

Note

Gaussian-2-Blender has already been published at the Journal of Chemical Education and is currently undergoing updates and changes to implement changes suggested by users and editors. The objective of the current changes is to submit the updated version as a usable app in the Journal of Cheminformatics.
